template.name: aem_textfield
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/textfield" fieldDescription="$FIELD_DESCRIPTION$" fieldLabel="$FIELD_LABEL$" name="./$NODE_NAME$" />

template.name: aem_cq_dialog_with_tab
template.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jcr:root xmlns:sling="http://sling.apache.org/jcr/sling/1.0" xmlns:cq="http://www.day.com/jcr/cq/1.0" xmlns:jcr="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/1.0" xmlns:nt="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/nt/1.0" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="$COMPONENT_NAME$" sling:resourceType="cq/gui/components/authoring/dialog"> <content jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/tabs" type="nav" /> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <$TAB_NODE$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="$TAB_NAME$" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/fixedcolumns" /> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <column jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> $END$ </items> </column> </items> </$TAB_NODE$> </items> </content> </jcr:root>
template.description: Touch UI dialog skeleton with tab

template.name: aem_image
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/fileupload" autoStart="{Boolean}false" class="cq-droptarget" fieldLabel="$FIELD_LABEL$" fileNameParameter="./$NODE_NAME$/fileName" mimeTypes="[image]" multiple="{Boolean}$FIELD_MULTIPLE$" name="./$NODE_NAME$/file" title="$FIELD_LABEL$" useHTML5="{Boolean}$USE_HTML5$" />

template.name: aem_cq_dialog_tab
template.value: <$TAB_NODE$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="$TAB_NAME$" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/fixedcolumns" /> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <column jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> $END$ </items> </column> </items> </$TAB_NODE$>
template.description: Touch UI dialog tab (usefull when you have dialog with tabs)

template.name: aem_select
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/select" fieldDescription="$FIELD_DESCRIPTION$" fieldLabel="$FIELD_LABEL$" name="./$NODE_NAME$"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <$FIRST_OPTION_NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" selected="{Boolean}true" text="$FIRST_OPTION_TEXT$" value="$FIRST_OPTION_NODE_NAME$" /> <$SECOND_OPTION_NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" text="$SECOND_OPTION_TEXT$" value="$SECOND_OPTION_NODE_NAME$" /> </items> </$NODE_NAME$>

template.name: aem_select_option
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" text="$OPTION_TEXT$" value="$NODE_NAME$" />

template.name: aem_pathbrowser
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/pathbrowser" fieldDescription="$FIELD_DESCRIPTION$" fieldLabel="$FIELD_LABEL$" name="./$NODE_NAME$" rootPath="/content$ROOT_PATH$"/>

template.name: aem_cq_dialog_without_tab
template.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jcr:root xmlns:sling="http://sling.apache.org/jcr/sling/1.0" xmlns:cq="http://www.day.com/jcr/cq/1.0" xmlns:jcr="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/1.0" xmlns:nt="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/nt/1.0" jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="$COMPONENT_NAME$" sling:resourceType="cq/gui/components/authoring/dialog"> <content jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/fixedcolumns" /> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <column jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> $END$ </items> </column> </items> </content> </jcr:root>

template.name: aem_numberfield
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/numberfield" defaultValue="$DEFAULT$" fieldDescription="$FIELD_DESCRIPTION$" fieldLabel="$FIELD_LABEL$" max="$MAX$" min="$MIN$" name="./$NODE_NAME$"/>

template.name: aem_numberfield_decimal
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/numberfield" defaultValue="$DEFAULT$" fieldDescription="$FIELD_DESCRIPTION$" fieldLabel="$FIELD_LABEL$" max="$MAX$" min="$MIN$" name="./$NODE_NAME$" step="$STEP$"/>

template.name: aem_checkbox
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/checkbox" fieldDescription="$FIELD_DESCRIPTION$" name="./$NODE_NAME$" text="$FIELD_TEXT$" value="true" /> <$NODE_NAME$-value-when-missing jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/hidden" name="./$NODE_NAME$@UseDefaultWhenMissing" value="{Boolean}true" /> <$NODE_NAME$-value-default jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/hidden" name="./$NODE_NAME$@DefaultValue" value="{Boolean}false" />

template.name: aem_include
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/include" path="$PATH_TO_INCLUDE$" />

template.name: aem_richtext
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="cq/gui/components/authoring/dialog/richtext" fieldDescription="$FIELD_DESCRIPTION$" fieldLabel="$FIELD_LABEL$" name="./$NODE_NAME$" useFixedInlineToolbar="{Boolean}true" />

template.name: aem_text
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/text" text="$FIELD_TEXT$"/>

template.name: aem_radiogroup
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/radiogroup" defaultValue="$DEFAULT_VALUE$" name="./$NODE_NAME$" text="$FIELD_TEXT$" > <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <$FIRST_OPTION$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/radio" text="$FIRST_OPTION_TEXT$" value="$FIRST_OPTION$" /> <$SECOND_OPTION$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/radio" text="$SECOND_OPTION_TEXT$" value="$SECOND_OPTION$" /> </items> </$NODE_NAME$>

template.name: aem_radiogroup_option
template.value: <$OPTION$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/radio" text="$OPTION_TEXT$" value="$OPTION$" />

template.name: aem_fieldset_with_background
template.value: <$NODE_NAME$ jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" jcr:title="$FIELD_LABEL$" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/form/fieldset"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/fixedcolumns"/> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <column jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> <well jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/container"> <layout jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured" sling:resourceType="granite/ui/components/foundation/layouts/well"/> <items jcr:primaryType="nt:unstructured"> $END$ </items> </well> </items> </column> </items> </$NODE_NAME$>

template.name: aem_component_definition
template.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jcr:root xmlns:cq="http://www.day.com/jcr/cq/1.0" xmlns:jcr="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/1.0" cq:isContainer="{Boolean}$IS_CONTAINER$" jcr:primaryType="cq:Component" jcr:title="$COMPONENT_TITLE$" componentGroup="$COMPONENT_GROUP$" />

template.name: aem_editconfig
template.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <jcr:root xmlns:cq="http://www.day.com/jcr/cq/1.0" xmlns:jcr="http://www.jcp.org/jcr/1.0" cq:dialogMode="floating" jcr:primaryType="cq:EditConfig"> <cq:listeners jcr:primaryType="cq:EditListenersConfig" afterdelete="$AFTER_DELETE$" aftermove="$ADTER_MOVE$E" afteredit="$AFTER_EDIT$" afterinsert="$AFTER_INSERT$"/> </jcr:root>

template.name: aem_template
